Summary: Naruto returns to Konoha after two-and-a-half years of training, just in time to help rescue the Fifth Kazekage from Akatsuki.
Naruto and a new version of Team 7 use information gained from Akatsuki to try to find Sasuke.
Naruto meets Sora, both of whom become entangled in a plot to destroy Konoha.
To counter the growing threat of Akatsuki, Konoha tracks down two of its members who are prowling the Land of Fire.
Konoha attempts to stop the Three-Tails from being acquired by Orochimaru or Akatsuki.
Sasuke and Naruto each assemble teams to make separate attempts to locate Sasuke's brother, Itachi Uchiha.
Jiraiya infiltrates Amegakure in order to learn more about the leader of Akatsuki, Pain.
Sasuke initiates a fight to the death with his brother, Itachi, hoping that doing so will avenge the deaths of their clan.
On their way home from their failed mission to find Itachi, Naruto and his team are diverted in order to fulfil Konoha's obligations to the Tsuchigumo clan.
Pain attacks Konoha in order to capture Naruto.

Arc Name: Past Arc: The Locus of Konoha
Summary: As Konoha starts to rebuild, its villagers reminisce about their memories of the past.
With Akatsuki in possession of nearly all nine tailed beasts, the Kage of the ninja villages gather to decide how to respond.
With the Fourth Shinobi World War declared, the Allied ninja and Akatsuki make opposing preparations for the approaching conflict.
The Allied ninja struggle against Akatsuki's White Zetsu Army and the historic figures revived by the Impure World Reincarnation.
After defeating the Impure World Reincarnation, the Allied ninja are left to deal with the combined forces of Madara and Obito Uchiha.

Arc Name: Kakashi's Anbu Arc: The Shinobi That Lives in the Darkness
Summary: Kakashi Hatake's past is explored, connecting the end of Kakashi Gaiden to the start of Prologue — Land of Waves.
After defeating the Impure World Reincarnation, the Allied ninja are left to deal with the combined forces of Madara and Obito Uchiha.
Using the nine tailed beasts captured by Akatsuki, Obito and Madara try to use the power of the resulting Ten-Tails to perform the Infinite Tsukuyomi.

Arc Name: Jiraiya Shinobi Handbook: The Tale of Naruto the Hero
Summary: Trapped by the Infinite Tsukuyomi, Tsunade dreams about a book that Jiraiya could have written.

Arc Name: Itachi Shinden Book: Light and Darkness
Summary: While the world falls victim to the Infinite Tsukuyomi, Sasuke reflects on the life of his brother, Itachi.
The Infinite Tsukuyomi introduces a new threat, Kaguya Ōtsutsuki, as well as an opportunity for Naruto and Sasuke to finally resolve their years of conflict.
Before they were heroes of the Fourth Shinobi World War, they were only children...
Wedding and shit!
